photography.name: Photography
photography.description: Photorealistic prompts for various photography styles

prompts.title: Professional Portrait
prompts.content: Professional headshot portrait of a confident businesswoman, studio lighting, sharp focus, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, clean background
prompts.description: Professional business portrait with studio lighting

prompts.title: Golden Hour Landscape
prompts.content: Breathtaking landscape photography of rolling hills during golden hour, warm soft light, dramatic sky with clouds, wide-angle shot, high dynamic range
prompts.description: Stunning landscape with golden hour lighting

cyberpunk.name: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.description: Futuristic cyberpunk aesthetics with neon lights

prompts.title: Neon City Street
prompts.content: Cyberpunk city street at night, neon signs reflecting in wet asphalt, flying cars in the distance, rain, atmospheric fog, blue and pink lighting, cinematic
prompts.description: Classic cyberpunk street scene with neon aesthetics

prompts.title: Enchanted Forest
prompts.content: Mystical enchanted forest with glowing mushrooms, fireflies, ancient twisted trees, soft ethereal lighting, magical atmosphere, fantasy art style
prompts.description: Magical forest scene with bioluminescent elements

prompts.title: City Timelapse
prompts.content: Time-lapse of a bustling city street from day to night, traffic flowing, lights turning on in buildings, smooth camera movement
prompts.description: Dynamic city timelapse showing day to night transition
